2. Hardware Size & Specification¶

2.1. Hardware Size¶

Product size: 75mm X 65mm X 20mm PCB thinkness: 1.5mm Hole diameter: 4mm

2.2. Specification¶

Size 75mm X 65mm X 20mm Without Packing
Power supply USB:5V 1A
